column4: microsoft doent even care about xp/media center anmore its going to have the same fate as 98
xp is booo,now its all about vista
XP is far superior to Vista. Hence why it's been in usage with companies for a decade and they don't want to switch up to Vista or 7
Cost is a factor; it would cost millions for a lot of large companies to switch, but it's also the fact that XP is pretty stable
